author: Chloe Kerr
title: How Mariah Carey went from ruling the music world to being the biggest laughing stock in the industry
text:
TV Magazine from diva to disaster How Mariah Carey went from ruling the music world to being the biggest laughing stock in the industry 
There have been lip-syncing disasters, almost daily wardrobe malfunctions and a car-crash engagement to a Â­billionaire followed by a rebound romance with a toyboy staffer By DAN WOOTTON, Bizarre Editor 20th February 2017, 12:42 am
